product_name: Salomon XR Shift Trail-Running Shoes - Women's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Built to handle a variety of surfaces, the women's Salomon XR Shift Trail-Running Shoes for women take on your favorite paths with a comfortable fit, neutral cushioning and reliable support. Breathable and abrasion-resistant nylon mesh uppers feature synthetic leather overlays that wrap and secure insteps for a precise fit. Women-specific last ensures the shoes work with the natural shape of women's feet, enhancing comfort and efficiency. Foam insoles enhance comfort; polyester linings quickly wick moisture away from feet and enhance comfort. Molded EVA midsoles help shield your feet from trail impacts; thermoplastic urethane inserts provide a barrier against sharp rocks underfoot. OS Tendon thermoplastic urethane frames run along the outsoles of the shoes to facilitate better heel-to-toe transitions and push-off efficiency. Contragrip HA(R) outsoles provide solid traction and tenacious grip; protective toe caps guard against bumps and abrasion. The Salomon XR Shift Trail-Running Shoes for women have reflective detailing to increase visibility in low light. Closeout.
short_description: Built to handle a variety of surfaces, the women's Salomon XR Shift Trail-Running Shoes for women take on your favorite paths with a comfortable fit, neutral cushioning and reliable support.
